Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Gusto \Gus"to\, n. [It. or Sp., fr. L. gustus; akin to E. choose. Cf. 2d {Gust}, {Go[^u]t}.] Nice or keen appreciation or enjoyment; relish; taste; fancy; as, he ate it with gusto. --Dryden. [1913 Webster]
gusto n : vigorous and enthusiastic enjoyment [syn: {relish}, {zest}, {zestfulness}]
